summary: A Spartan Helmet from the Popular Halo Franchise.
descriptionHtml:
The item textures aren\'t perfect, I\'ve toned down the specularity map so hopefully it\'ll look more realistic now.


Watch the helmet being worn in-game here: [youtube]Hnwu3OP4Qv8[/youtube]
Sorry for the bad quality



To get this Item you will need to Craft it from a smithing forge.

I\'ve made this helmet moderately difficult to craft, to add a bit of extra fun to the mod.

The items needed are:

~ 1 FireSalts
~ 1 FrostSalts
~ 2 Gold Ingots
~ 3 Filled Petty Soul Gems
~ 22 Iron Ingots

The Helmet is located under Iron items.

Installation:

It\'d be best to use Nexus Mod Manager to install this mod, but I\'m sure it\'d be simple enough to do it manually if you know what you\'re doing.

Make sure to check the Data Files Via the skyrim Loader to make sure the .esp file is ticked!

Keep an eye out for:

Better Texture maps: more detail to the textures and sizes

Variations of color: Helmets could be different colors. Red, blue etc.

Full spartan body suit: Full armor to match the spartan helmet.

Bobble Head: fun mod filled with bobble head helmets, muffin men, gingerbread costumes, over powered \'fun weapons\' and more!

Armour Tiers: Lowest tier is easier to craft, but provides less bonuses. highest tier is hardest to craft, while giving the best bonuses. I may create different armors for each Tier.
author: vespidae
